subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Oakland bruised Vidal Nuno for eight runs in three innings in a 10-5 rout, to improve to 42-27. The Yankees, who are only two games over .500, scored once in six innings against Jesse Chavez.
snippet: Oakland bruised Vidal Nuno for eight runs in three innings in a 10-5 rout, to improve to 42-27. The Yankees, who are only two games over .500, scored once in six innings against Jesse Chavez.
